definition: obviously/plainly/undoubtedly/definitely

Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: Mingming came to my house today.
Working is like old-time marriage, obviously you got no happiness, but still you have to live with it.
sentences.chinese: 上班就像旧时代的婚姻，明明不幸福，还得长相厮守。

sentences.english: Clearly know is the abyss, I still smiling to see you jump down.
sentences.chinese: 明明知道是万丈深渊，我还是笑着看你往下跳。

sentences.english: But is is just hypocrisy clearly, but foolishly think you love me.
sentences.chinese: 而是明明只是虚情假意，却傻傻地以为你爱我。

sentences.english: For the sake of defending Mingming's mistake, Jianzhong has a quarrel with Shixian once again.
sentences.chinese: 建中为了维护明明，再一次与世贤气冲突。

sentences.english: Those questions should now be answered decisively.
sentences.chinese: 而这些问题现在到了应该明明白白地回答的时候了。

sentences.english: Is clearly for themselves, it is not the name of someone else's banner.
sentences.chinese: 明明是为自己，却还打着别人的旗号。

sentences.english: Mummy actually thinks that Justin is learning really well.
sentences.chinese: 明明妈咪觉得大贝贝学得很好呀。

sentences.english: Ep478 - Jinsheng meets Mingming at the lounge. She left a special impression on Jinsheng.
sentences.chinese: 金生在酒廊遇到认识明明，明明令让他留下深刻印象。

sentences.english: Ep478 - Jinsheng meets Mingming at the lounge. She left a special impression on Jinsheng.
sentences.chinese: 金生在酒廊遇到认识明明，明明令让他留下深刻印象。

sentences.english: Ep688 - Yingming fawns on Mingming's father as he plans to woo Mingming.
sentences.chinese: 英明百般讨好明明的父亲，希望他帮忙追求明明。

sentences.english: Ep688 - Yingming fawns on Mingming's father as he plans to woo Mingming.
sentences.chinese: 英明百般讨好明明的父亲，希望他帮忙追求明明。

sentences.english: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.
sentences.chinese: 只是没有人明明的讲论他，因为怕犹太人。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Mingmiong gets closer to Jingsheng as she wants to have a better life.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，明明更接近金生，希望改善生活。

sentences.english: This is the teaching, full of sobriety, that Freud gives us.
sentences.chinese: 这就是佛洛伊德给予我们的教导，明明白白地。

definition: (indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people
but/however/(used for emphasis) indeed
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to appear to be/to seem as if
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
why?/for what reason?

always
as if/to seem like
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!

interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
